query:
SELECT tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, tc.status, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checklistItemResults WHERE taskChecklistId = tc.id) as item_count
FROM taskChecklists tc
ORDER BY tc.id DESC
LIMIT 10
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, tc.status, 
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checklistItemResults WHERE taskChecklistId = tc.id) as item_count
FROM taskChecklists tc
ORDER BY tc.id DESC
LIMIT 10
